schema:creator: Schwarz, Trudi
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ This is a photo of a blue dasher dragonfly. They fly around my backyard all summer long and I am fascinated by their delicate beauty. They always land on this particular stick planted in the garden which I call 'Dragonfly Landing.' I have had lots of time to watch and photograph them while I sheltered in place over the past few months. They make me smile every day. (I used some Instagram filters on this photo.)  
 __Participant age:__ 51  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Photography
schema:name: Backyard Beauty
